ComicInfo.Title: You Say You Want a Revolution? (Part 3)
ComicInfo.Summary: Swanky new Corporate Deadpool continues his makeover of the Krook Home World, turning it into a modern resort planet. Unfortunately, the Omega Confederation hired The Deadpool Corps to put down the rebels, not diversify them, so they cook up a little surprise for the rogue merc. Meanwhile, not all of the Krook are happy with Deadpool's changes, and the Krook King starts a guerrilla war of his own, leading to a split within the Deadpool Corps itself. The key question burning in everyone's mind ... which side will Dogpool be on?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 18:19:24. [CVDB252997]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Broken Blade, Deadpool, Dogpool, Kidpool, Lady Deadpool, Princess Teela, Zombie Deadpool
